text_blocks: I can see that my current user is in the "External" department, which means this is an external user (contractor, partner, etc.). According to the rules, external users cannot access employee salary information.

input.message: I cannot access employee salary information. As an external user, you do not have permission to view employee data including salaries. This information is restricted to internal employees only.
